actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

actions.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Ordered placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 147.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4960 West Washington Boulevard in Las Angeles, California, as the "Ray Charles Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4960 West Washington Boulevard in Las Angeles, California, as the "Ray Charles Post Office Building."

titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4960 West Washington Boulevard in Las Angeles, California, as the "Ray Charles Post Office Building".
